# @iamjariwala/react-doc-viewer

> The most feature-complete open-source document viewer for React.

Render PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, video, CSV, HTML, and 20+ file types in a single drop-in component. Built-in annotations, drag-and-drop file upload, thumbnail sidebar, zoom controls, page navigation, dark mode, print, fullscreen, text search, bookmarks/TOC, watermarks, password-protected PDFs, keyboard shortcuts, split/compare view, theming (CSS variables), and i18n (14 languages) — all with full TypeScript support.

## Install

```bash
npm install @iamjariwala/react-doc-viewer
```

## Basic Usage

```tsx
import DocViewer, { DocViewerRenderers } from "@iamjariwala/react-doc-viewer";
import "@iamjariwala/react-doc-viewer/dist/index.css";

<DocViewer
  documents={[{ uri: "https://example.com/sample.pdf" }]}
  pluginRenderers={DocViewerRenderers}
/>;
```

## Key Features

- 20+ file types: PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, PNG, JPG, GIF, TIFF, WebP, BMP, CSV, TXT, HTML, Markdown, RTF, MP4, ODT
- DOCX inline rendering with page navigation (via docx-preview)
- Markdown rendering with sanitized HTML output
- RTF rendering with formatted text display
- Toolbar for all file types: download, print, zoom, and page navigation controls
- Annotations: highlight, freehand draw, comments, export as JSON
- Drag & Drop file upload with type/size validation
- Thumbnail sidebar with click-to-jump for PDFs
- Programmatic page navigation via ref or jumpToPage prop
- Dark Mode: light, dark, or auto (prefers-color-scheme) with CSS variable theming
- Print: native print dialog via toolbar button or Ctrl+P shortcut
- Fullscreen: toggle via toolbar button or F key shortcut
- Loading Progress Bar: animated progress indicator during PDF loading
- Watermark Overlay: repeated rotated text overlay (e.g., "CONFIDENTIAL") on PDF pages
- Text Selection & Copy: enable react-pdf text layer for selecting and copying text
- Keyboard Shortcuts: page navigation, zoom, search, print, fullscreen — all via keyboard
- Password-Protected PDFs: modal prompt for encrypted PDF files
- Text Search: full-text search across all PDF pages with match highlighting, page navigation, and prev/next match controls
- PDF Bookmarks / TOC: sidebar with auto-extracted PDF outline, nested items, click-to-navigate
- Split View / Compare: side-by-side document comparison with draggable divider and sync scroll
- 14 built-in languages (en, ar, de, es, fr, it, ja, pl, pt, ru, se, sr, sr_cyr, tr)
- Theming via CSS variables (--rdv-*) or theme prop
- Custom renderers for any file type
- Works with Next.js, Vite, CRA, Remix, Gatsby
- React 17, 18, and 19 supported
- No external services — all rendering is client-side
- HTML sanitized with DOMPurify
- Tree-shakeable — import only renderers you need
- Apache-2.0 license
